thread.title: Happy in Virginia
thread.title_full: Fireplace Remote Controls reviewed by Happy in Virginia

author: Happy in Virginia
title: Happy in Virginia
text: I needed to replace a ten year old remote control that had loose battery connections. My original supplier had gone out of business. I tried to get a new remote through a locally advertised fireplace company. They refused to order anything without a $400.00 inspection. Fortunately, I found Trustpilot on-line. After talking to the very polite Trustpilot representative, I had my new remote 2 days later. I am very happy.
